name: darks-orm
short_description: Darks is a comprehensive type of lightweight ORM data persistence layer framework, integrated Hibernate "automation" ORM framework for the convenience, stability, as well as the Mybatis ORM framework "semi-automatic" efficient, high concurrency, set two ORM patterns as a whole.The framework to simplify the cumbersome configuration process, using Jython script language extensions, as a dynamic SQL language realization scheme.Construction of a highly efficient multi function domain data cache, and integrated EhCache third party data cache.
summary: a simple, convenient, fast, powerful ORM data persistence layer.
